description:
A premium base layer that will keep you warm on the coldest of days, the Merino Leggings features a 100% merino wool fabric with luxuriously soft 15.5 micron fibers for the ultimate in next-to-skin softness. Naturally stretchy, breathable and odor resistant, these leggings also feature a high waist for added coverage and a gusseted construction for increased mobility. Flatlock stitching throughout ensures a soft, chafe-free feel.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker MerinoFine Leggings - Mens
